game_description: Office Escape Rooms is a series of rooms and areas to explore and solve in order to complete them. There are 4 levels to choose from. Cubicles, Kitchen, Office and Toilet. The controls are simple and there are teleport AND smooth locomotion. Feel free to rate, comment and give us feedback about what you like, dislike and what could be fun to see in the upcoming levels. If you encounter any bugs, please report them on our Discord Server. We will also host give aways and events on discord so join us and be a part of our development. Discord: https://discord.gg/EGdpMnq22Y
review_1: Very fun game, got thru the first 4 and need more rooms. I can see growing and releasing 4 room packs every so often, I'm sure people will pay for addons.
review_2: and the puzzle are funny, not the usual -think hard- games. You should think -I'm just playing- and you solve everything. I want more!
review_3: A really great game that proved really challenging! I've only played one level at the time of writing this review, but it actually beat me! The only thing I would suggest is possibly adding hints, but I loved the challenge, some great and unique puzzles! My video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3HI3EhL8phY
review_5: Had a blast in these escape rooms. Very creative and clever. Challenging but not excessive. Looking forward to more. Thanks for the fun. Still laughing after I figured out two of the solutions. Great job!
